# z-thead



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

ZThead component.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `sticky` | `sticky`  | If true, the header will be stuck to the top of the table. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description              |
| ---- | ------------------------ |
|      | ZThead content (`z-tr`). |
